hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #6# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Epona's Song#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #a Slingshot# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Kokiri Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Shadow Temple#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.
